name: It’s A Burger Eat Burger World
name_original: It’s A Burger Eat Burger World
description:
The FREE, weird and puzzling puzzle game from Jimmy Vegas. Developed in Unity.

What is "Burger World"?

Burger world is an 18-level puzzle game where a burger eats other burgers. Literally, that's what it is. Complete each level to move to the next one.

Be careful though, there's a time limit on each level.

Plus there's some nasty crystals stopping you (not sure why exactly).
There's also some disappearing ledges!! (again, really not sure why).

Why was "Burger World" made?

The game was made in 2018 over a period of about 3 weeks. The idea behind creating "Burger World" is to show that something cool can be designed, built and coded in a short space of time, much like my other projects.

The game was originally built for mobile devices and every effort has been made to ensure the game works on a standard Windows set up.

What PC Specifications do I need?

You'll need at least: CPU: Intel i5 1.8 Ghz or equivalent RAM: 4GB or better OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 or equivalent VIDEO CARD: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or better or equivalent FREE DISK SPACE: 150Mb

What happens in the game?

Spread over 3 worlds, you have to collect enough burgers to progress to the next world. Try collecting all the burgers in all the levels. You'll have to think how you can accomplish each level with 100% completion - not every level is as simple as it looks.

Anything else to know?

If something cool can be made in a short time, just imagine what a team can do in a longer period of time. Bugs & glitches will be present, but no game-breaking bugs should exist in the demo.

The game isn't meant to be taken too seriously. It's just meant to make you smile or confuse you.

Finally, this game is free. Any donations received will be donated to a charity annually.
